definition: rime dictionary (ancient type of Chinese dictionary that collates characters by tone and rhyme rather than by radical)

sound and meaning
thirty six initial consonants of Song phonetic theory
commentary and subcommentary (of a book)
entering tone/checked tone/one of the four tones of Middle Chinese
to annotate (ancient texts)/commentaries
"Summary of the Collection of Rhymes Old and New", supplemented and annotated Yuan dynasty version of the no-longer-extant late Song or early Yuan "Collection of Rhymes Old and New" 古今韻會|古今韵会
